sentences.sContent: Mr Assange said Wikileaks must "aggressively fundraise in order to fight back against this blockade and its proponents".
sentences.sContent_eng: Mr Assange said Wikileaks must "aggressively fundraise in order to fight back against this blockade and its proponents".
sentences.sCn: 阿桑奇先生说维基解密必须”积极募集资金以对经济封锁和其幕后操纵者予以反击。

remMethod.val: fund(资金) + raise(筹集) → 筹集资金 → 募捐
